channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report E-2024010481
item.description:
Report E-2024010481

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-01T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: CANTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 23, 2024, a skid carrying twenty-five (25) boxes of UN1263 was damaged and released approximately fifteen (15) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Restoration (ER) to remediate the site. ER personnel deployed granular absorbent to the trailer floor and worked them in with hand tools, utilizing a degreasing agent with absorbent wipes to collect any residual product. All paint impacted material was collected and containerized for disposal by R+L.

item.title: Report X-2024010557
item.description:
Report X-2024010557

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-12
  • City: CHELMSFORD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED SIX FULL NITROUS OXIDE CYLINDERS WITH A TOTAL NET WEIGHT OF 7.67 POUNDS. INNER BOX IS MARKED AND LABELED UN1070, NITROUS OXIDE WITH 2.2 AND 5.1 DIAMOND LABELS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTERMOST FIBERBOARD BOX. RED FRAGILE STICKERS ARE APPLIED TO THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX HAS BEEN REUSED, THERE IS A GROUND THERMAL TRACKING LABEL UNDER ONE OF THE FLAPS, NOT VISIBLE. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
